scriptItem.label: Isolate [OD]

context.expression: node = kwargs["node"] if type(node) == hou.ObjNode: return True return False

scriptItem.label: Rizom Bridge [OD]

context.expression: node = kwargs["node"] if type(node) != hou.SopNode: return False return True

scriptItem.scriptCode:
import tempfile, os, hou from OD import rizomBridge ########################################################################### # Change the RizomUV path to your location # ########################################################################### rizomPath = os.getenv('rizomuvpath') ################## DONT TOUCH ANYTHING BELOW THIS LINE ####################
exportFile = tempfile.gettempdir() + os.sep + "odrizombridge.obj"
res = hou.ui.displayMessage("OD Rizom Bridge\nby Oliver Hotz @ oliver@heimlich.net", buttons=('Send To Rizom','Send To Rizom (Clear UVs)','Get from Rizom', 'Automatic Roundtrip', 'Cancel')) if res == 0: rizomBridge.sendToRizom(rizomPath = rizomPath, exportFile = exportFile, nodes=kwargs["items"]) if res == 1: rizomBridge.sendToRizomClearUvs(rizomPath = rizomPath, exportFile = exportFile, nodes=kwargs["items"]) if res == 2: rizomBridge.getFromRizom(nodes=kwargs["items"], rizomPath = rizomPath, exportFile = exportFile) if res == 3: rizomBridge.automaticRoundtrip(rizomPath = rizomPath, exportFile = exportFile, nodes=kwargs["items"])

context.expression: node = kwargs["node"] if type(node) != hou.SopNode: return False return True

if "Redshift_ROP" not in str(hou.ropNodeTypeCategory().nodeTypes()): return False node = kwargs["node"] if type(node) != hou.ObjNode and type(node) != hou.SopNode: return False return True
if "rop_vray" not in str(hou.ropNodeTypeCategory().nodeTypes()): return False node = kwargs["node"] if type(node) != hou.ObjNode and type(node) != hou.SopNode: return False return True
node = kwargs["node"] if node.type().name() != "cam": return False return True
node = kwargs["node"] if node.type().name() != "cam": return False return True
node = kwargs["node"] if type(node) != hou.SopNode: return False return True
node = kwargs["node"] if type(node) != hou.SopNode: return False return True
